text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Woolery’s perspective quickly changed. He shared that his son tested positive. “To further clarify, Covid-19 is real & it is here. My son tested positive for the virus, & I feel for of those suffering, especially for those who have lost loved ones." https://t.co/nD2LJlYRWj
